description: Users of Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 120.0.2210.61 may observe inappropriate user interface behaviors, which are indicative of underlying issues addressed in the recent update. This behavior includes irregularities in the web browser's UI, potentially affecting user experience and navigation. The symptom arises as a result of vulnerabilities previously associated with CVE-2023-6512 and is crucial for administrators to note when ensuring the security and stability of their environments. For complete details, refer to KB-120.0.2210.61.
